document_data.mainbody: '''Artur''' was an elderly [[brown bear]] in [[Marigold's Menagerie]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Behavior: In his old age Artur was a rather lazy creature.
document_data.History: Artur spent most of his life as the [[animal companion]] to a [[druid]]. When his druid eventually died he was taken in by [[Marigold Mufflefoot]] and given a permanent home at Marigold's Menagerie, for he knew that simply letting the aged [[bear]] return to the wild would surely spell its death. Whenever Marigold could manage to get Artur outside to exercise, it always attracted a crowd.
